participant_1.name: George
participant_1.personality: easy-going, enjoys spending time outdoors and sharing stories.
participant_1.background: i've been retired for a years. i go gambling in my spare time. i move south during the winter. i like to grill outdoors.

participant_2.name: Lisa
participant_2.personality: nostalgic, enjoys reminiscing about childhood and has a passion for music.
participant_2.background: my favorite toy as a child was my lite brite. i love new kids on the block. i was born in the early 80s. i also like old school hip hop.
